title: Maintenance Fluids Calculations
desc: The Maintenance Fluids Calculator calculates maintenance fluid requirements by weight.

orgreference.text: Holiday MA, Segar WE. The maintenance need for water in parenteral fluid therapy. Pediatrics 1957.

other_refer.text: Arya VK. Basics of fluid and blood transfusion therapy in paediatric surgical patients. Indian Journal of Anaesthesia 2012;56(5):454-462. doi:10.4103/0019-5049.103960.

data.evidence:
Calculated using the “4-2-1” Rule:

  • For 0-10 kg: 4 mL/kg/hr
  • For >10-20 kg: 40 mL + 2 mL/kg/hr for every kg >10 kg
  • For >20 kg: 60 mL + 1 mL/kg/hr for every kg >20 kg
